name: Forbidden Dojo
description:
Enter the world of Forbidden Dojo, where your every choice will determine the path of your journey. The stunning artwork, lush landscapes, and intricate characters will immerse you in a world of ancient beauty and sensual mystery. As you delve deeper into the story, you'll encounter a cast of intriguing characters, each with their own unique personalities, motivations, and desires.



Forbidden Dojo is an erotic, adult visual novel that will take you on a journey to a world of forbidden desires and sensual adventures. Set in ancient times, you are transported to a mysterious realm, where two powerful female warriors are locked in an epic struggle. These warriors, a martial arts expert and a magical user, are both drawn to you, and they will stop at nothing to win your affection.



As you navigate this exotic world of oriental erotica, you'll be faced with choices that will shape the outcome of the story. Will you succumb to the temptations of the martial arts master, whose expertise in the art of seduction is unmatched? Or will you be lured in by the magic-wielding beauty, whose alluring power will leave you breathless?



Experience the thrill of martial arts and magic, as you explore this captivating world of sensual delight. With explicit sexual scenes and a narrative that will leave you begging for more, Forbidden Dojo is the ultimate journey of self-discovery and forbidden love. Get ready to enter a world of pure desire and indulge in a tale that will leave you breathless. The fate of your journey rests solely in your hands, so choose wisely and let the heat of the moment guide you to an unforgettable climax.
